description: Stackover Login and logout with valid & Invalid credentials

steps.name: User Click on log-in button in Slockover flow page
User entering User name & password in Sign-In Page
User Click on log-in button in Sign-In Page
Verifying StackOverflow link is present & enabled in User home page
Verifying Tag link is present & enabled in User home page
User Click on log-Out button in Sign-In Page
